structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.history: Repealed 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 416, sec. 20, effective July 13, 1984. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2764.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: First class city takes over rights and liabilities of city annexed.
